title: Legacy Watch Face
summary: Legacy watch face for Android Wear. Classic meets modern.
description: Legacy watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classic watchface combined with the modern functions of Android Wear.Key custom watch face features are:-Multiple customization possibilities-Great readability-Clean and minimalistic lookWatch face dials offer the following information points: -Battery indicator -Date information-Weather information-Step counter for Google Fit -Second digital timeAndroid Wear 2.0 complications:This is a super flexible way to customize the information you see on this gorgeous watch face. In order to choose third party complications, please open the settings of the watch face on the smartwatch. Choose complications and select third-party complications. Now you can choose between a large selection of complications data providers. More watch facesVisit our exclusive watchmaker collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4. Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces.Important notesThis watchface is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and modern round watches such as the Moto 360.This minimalistic watch face is exclusively made for Android Wear and does not work on smartwatches with another operating system, e.g. the Samsung Gear watch.Weather information is provided by http://openweathermap.orgMinimalistic design by Mike Montgomery
descriptionHTML:
Legacy watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classic watchface combined with the modern functions of Android Wear.

Key custom watch face features are:

-Multiple customization possibilities
-Great readability
-Clean and minimalistic look

Watch face dials offer the following information points:

-Battery indicator
-Date information
-Weather information
-Step counter for Google Fit
-Second digital time

Android Wear 2.0 complications:

This is a super flexible way to customize the information you see on this gorgeous watch face. In order to choose third party complications, please open the settings of the watch face on the smartwatch. Choose complications and select third-party complications. Now you can choose between a large selection of complications data providers.

More watch faces

Visit our exclusive watchmaker collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4. Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces.

Important notes

This watchface is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and modern round watches such as the Moto 360.

This minimalistic watch face is exclusively made for Android Wear and does not work on smartwatches with another operating system, e.g. the Samsung Gear watch.

Weather information is provided by http://openweathermap.org

Minimalistic design by Mike Montgomery
comments: Very slik design. The date in the complications doesn't keep up but fixed it by using a 3rd party app to fill in the correct date (androidwear  clock).
Date complication doesn't update on new day. Have to switch faces then switch back to get correct date.
App crashes on Huawei watch. Date complication doesn't work, and 3rd party complications don't show.
Liked it a lot, only problem is widgets/dials are a little dark compared to the rest of the watch. Minimal ambient looks nice
Doesn't connect to LG Gear R
